column5: THEY ARE STARTING TO STACK AND GET DARK IN THE LAKE  START FISHING THEM NOW!!!!!!!!! GOOD LUCK
I'd love to hit a few places after work.  Any places better then others?  Or pretty much any river mouth should do.
WOOHHOOOO ...Was planning on hitting bronte and the credit tonight...Look for the guy casting glow spoons LOL

You guys are a little slow...I got a 12 lber drifting the river yesterday!      ...no seriously, I did. Complete fluke, I walked 3 km of river and there was one confused salmon. Water was super clear, took a half worm that I was drifting for small browns and bows. Also got into a coho of about 3 lbs right at the mouth of the river so its getting to spoon chuckin time!
Save me a spot on the credit bud, lol.  I can stand on one foot ya know and don't take much room.  Goodluck.
... and then Peter was arrested for inciting several riots at local tributaries!!!
I am THAT GUY!  see you guys around .. please come say HI if you see a short chubby asian with 15 ft float rod with 20g pike slip float!  haha, I only use ONE arm to cast ... save me a spot
collected some skein last week, it's getting pretty ripe. Messy job curing it.  thanks for the update BITE!
So Peter I want to see some fish pics from you .Forget the memory storage go out and fish and make a report with pics.  No excuses
